name: BestPlayer
0:
”Alexa, ask best player who is the best player”
”Alexa, ask best player to vote for messi”
”Alexa, ask best player who is messi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best player
des: Let the war begin. Is it Messi or Ronaldo. Who's the best? Let's vote for our favourite player and make him the best. Ask the best player skill to tell you interesting info about your player. To vote just say, "Alexa, ask best player to vote for messi". To find out the current best player just say, "Alexa, ask best player who is the best player". Ask Alexa to tell about your player by saying, "Alexa, ask best player to tell about messi". Have fun. If you have any issues, review it and I will try to solve it as soon as possible.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
